subject: Fashion
title: Seoul Fashion Week Influence
description: A 60-second lesson on Seoul Fashion Week Influence.

hook.text: Seoul went from fashion unknown to global trendsetter in under a decade.

buildup.text: K-beauty and K-pop created a halo effect that boosted Korean fashion brands.

discovery.text: Seoul street style mixes oversized silhouettes with meticulous accessorizing.

twist.text: Korean shoppers adopt trends faster than any other market on Earth.

climax.text: Western brands now launch in Seoul first to test what goes viral.

punchline.text: Seoul is fashion's fastest focus group.

quiz.question: Why do Western brands test launches in Seoul?
options: Korean consumers adopt trends extremely fast
